title: UserU
author: UserU
created_time: September 04, 2022, 03:16:53 PMLast edit: January 30, 2023, 03:40:09 PM by UserU
content: Unlike other books we see elsewhere, this contents of this eBook are straightforward with the apps that have paid out to their users. As long as you have an Android phone/ or a Windows desktop, it should be suitable for you!So far I've earned quite a nice amount with my phone(s) and PC so I thought sharing it would be beneficial for many unaware of such.My suggestions are divided into 4 categories, which I have written in an easy-to-read formatting. In total, there are 44 pages.While they are not there to make one rich, rather importantly, they serve as passive beermoney and most are mainly the setup-and-forget kind. Best of all, no capital investment required beforehand. You won't regret it!Just download it directly from the link below, no catch!https://tinyurl.com/PIA10

comments.author: IIrik11
comments.body: good book with genuine ideas that can actually make you a little side income without much effort!pm me if u have any more ideas like these, even if they're not passive and require effort.need some good ways to earn money online but can't find anything worth doing.

comments.body: Quote from: IIrik11 on October 11, 2022, 11:58:42 AMgood book with genuine ideas that can actually make you a little side income without much effort!pm me if u have any more ideas like these, even if they're not passive and require effort.need some good ways to earn money online but can't find anything worth doing.¬† Hey IIrik,Thanks for the feedback! The book contents will be updated along with the link once I find more, don't worry.Yup, those apps you see are not meant to replace your day job. You can try GPT sites like ySense if you need more side income
